name: Somnum Exterreri
description:
EN-

Caleb is a boy who suffers from constant nightmares. Every night he is transported to a terrifying world where ancient monsters chase him, though the greatest danger is the eternal void beneath his feet. His only chance to wake up again is by collecting all his Hannah Belle dolls. Only they can help Caleb to wake up and see the light of a new day.

ES-

Caleb es un niño que sufre de pesadillas constantes. Todas las noches es transportado a un mundo terrorífico donde terribles monstruos lo acechan, aunque el peligro mas grande es el vacío eterno debajo de sus pies. Su única chance de volver a despertar consiste en reunir a todas sus muñecas Hannah Belle, solo ellas pueden ayudarlo a despertar para ver la luz de un nuevo día.

  • Jump: Spacebar.
  • Movement: W,A,S,D.
  • Ariel Winkler: Programming - Game Design.
  • Azul Mousseigne: Programming - Level Design - Game Design.
  • Dylan Piserchia: UI Design - Game Design.
  • Gabriel Corbani: Programming - Game Design.
  • Lautaro Falco: Level Design - Game Design.

We are all #ImageCampus’ students.
